semantic__bibdata.semantic__title: Digital cinema — LED screen — Technical requirements and test methods
数字电影 — LED影厅 — 技术要求和测量方法

semantic__organization.semantic__name: 中华人民共和国国家质量监督检验检疫总局 中国国家标准化管理委员会
中华人民共和国国家质量监督检验检疫总局 中国国家标准化管理委员会

semantic__foreword.semantic__p: 本文件按照GB/T 1.1—2020《标准化工作导则 第1部分：标准化文件的结构和起草规则》的规定起草。
请注意本文件的某些内容可能涉及专利。本文件的发布机构不承担识别这些专利的责任。
本文件由国家电影局归口。
本文件起草单位：中国电影科学技术研究所（中央宣传部电影技术质量检测所）、深圳市时代华影科技股份有限公司、深圳市洲明科技股份有限公司、中影光峰激光影院技术（北京）有限公司、利亚德光电股份有限公司。
本文件主要起草人：李娜、董强国、刘知一、张伟、龚波、高五峰、高峰、高峰、张辉、王景宇、贾波、周永业、董志刚、张鹏昊、张硕。

semantic__clause.semantic__p: 本文件规定了数字电影LED影厅的技术要求及相应的测量方法。
本文件适用于数字电影LED影厅的运行维护、检测认证、质量监督、技术管理和相关设备的安装、调试、验收和维护。

semantic__terms.semantic__p: 下列术语和定义适用于本文件。
ISO和IEC用于标准化的术语数据库地址如下：

semantic__li.semantic__p: ISO在线浏览平台: 位于
IEC Electropedia: 位于

semantic__terms.semantic__p: 下列术语和定义适用于本文件。

semantic__verbal-definition.semantic__p: 采用数字电影技术，使用LED显示屏放映电影的影厅。
以LED像素显示文字、图像及视频等信息的装置，通常包括LED屏体及显示控制系统等基本组成成分，也可包括辅助系统等，可采用一体式或分体式结构。
LED显示屏的最小成像单元。 注：通常由红色、绿色、蓝色发光二极管组成，每个发光二极管可视为亚像素。
显示设备的输入编码值与光输出之间的函数关系。
左眼（右眼）图像亮度对串扰光和环境光的抗扰能力。

semantic__termnote.semantic__p: 左眼（右眼）图像亮度与串扰光和环境光的比，用：1方式表示。

semantic__clause.semantic__p: 下列缩略语适用于本文件。
IMB 集成媒体模块（Integrated Media Block）
HDR 高动态范围（High Dynamic Range）
SDR 标准动态范围（Standard Dynamic Range）
数字电影LED影厅技术要求应符合的规定。

semantic__table.semantic__name: 数字电影LED影厅技术要求

semantic__tr.semantic__td: a Filmmakers can prepare content that is optimized for any or each of the targets, and such content should always be clearly identified as to the intended playback luminance.

semantic__clause.semantic__p: The spectroradiometer shall comply with the requirements specified in 4.5.

Screen luminance shall be measured with a spot photometer having the spectral luminance response of the standard observer (photopic vision), as defined in . The acceptance angle of the photometer shall be 2° or less. The lower limit of the measuring range shall be 0,01 cd/m2 or better. The photometer response to luminance variation over time shall be to properly integrate any such variation occurring at frequencies at or above 24 Hz and display the arithmetic mean value.
The digital code values of the white field signal is (X‘=3 794, Y‘=3 960, Z‘=3 890).
Measurement conditions shall meet the following requirements.

semantic__li.semantic__p: All equipment shall be in normal operating status.
Measurement shall be carried out after the light output of the digital projector stabilizes. Digital projector shall project white field signal through the stereoscopic equipment for 15 min.
The light of the digital projector shall pass through the stereoscopic projection equipment.
When measuring through the stereoscopic glasses they shall be placed in a horizontal state, as a viewer would wear them. No tilt from the horizontal axis is allowed.
All signals shall be output to the digital projector by Media Block. The measurement shall cover all valid screen images.
Measurement location in the auditorium shall comply with the requirements specified in 4.3.
Measurement locations on the screen of Luminance, difference shall comply with the requirements specified in 4.2.
For using dual stereoscopic cinema screenings, both of the digital projectors shall also be turned on and working normally.
The measurement of the optical system of stereoscopic projection should be carried out within the range of the white colour chromaticity coordinates of the centre of the screen.

semantic__clause.semantic__title: The measurement of the optical system of stereoscopic projection

semantic__li.semantic__p: Open the photometer and make it work normally.
Set the digital projector as the stereoscopic projection mode and use the stereoscopic projection equipment.
The white field signal is simultaneously displayed in the left and right eyes.

Using the photometer to measure and record the left-eye white field centre luminance,
L
l w
L_(lw), and the right-eye white field centre luminance,
L
r w
L_(rw), through the left-eye lens and the right-eye lens of the stereo glasses.

Calculate and record the centre luminance,
L
L, according to :

semantic__dd.semantic__p: is the centre luminance of the white field of the left-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the right-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

semantic__li.semantic__p:
Refer to the measurement method of centre luminance, record the left-eye white field centre luminance
L
l w
L_(lw) and the right-eye white field centre luminance
L
l w
L_(lw).

Calculate and record the luminance difference ratio
L d

semantic__dd.semantic__p: is the centre luminance of the white field of the left-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the right-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

semantic__li.semantic__p: Open the photometer and make it work normally.
Set the digital projector as the stereoscopic projection mode and use the stereoscopic projection equipment.
The white field signal is simultaneously displayed in the left and right eyes.

Measure the luminance,
L
l w
L_(lw), of white field in the centre of screen and the luminance,
L
l s
L_(ls), of white field of four sides by using photometer through stereoscopic glasses of left-eye.

Measure the luminance,
L
r w
L_(rw), of white field in the centre of screen and the luminance,
L
l s

Calculate and record the side luminance uniformity,
U l
U_(l) of the upper, lower, left and right edges of the white field of the left-eye according to :

semantic__dd.semantic__p: is the left-eye side luminance uniformity;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the left-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the left-eye luminance of white field of four sides when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

semantic__li.semantic__p:
calculate and record the side luminance uniformity
U r
U_(r) of the upper, lower, left and right sides of the white field of the right-eye according to :

semantic__dd.semantic__p: is the right-eye side luminance uniformity;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the right-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the right-eye luminance of white field of four sides when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

semantic__li.semantic__p: Open the spectroradiometer and make it work normally.
Set the digital projector as the stereoscopic projection mode and use the stereoscopic projection equipment.
The white field signal is simultaneously displayed in the left and right eyes.
Using the spectroradiometer to measure and record the centre white chromaticity through the left-eye lens and the right-eye lens of the stereo glasses.

foreword.title: 前 言
foreword.p: 本文件按照GB/T 1.1—2020《标准化工作导则 第1部分：标准化文件的结构和起草规则》的规定起草。
请注意本文件的某些内容可能涉及专利。本文件的发布机构不承担识别这些专利的责任。
本文件由国家电影局归口。
本文件起草单位：中国电影科学技术研究所（中央宣传部电影技术质量检测所）、深圳市时代华影科技股份有限公司、深圳市洲明科技股份有限公司、中影光峰激光影院技术（北京）有限公司、利亚德光电股份有限公司。
本文件主要起草人：李娜、董强国、刘知一、张伟、龚波、高五峰、高峰、高峰、张辉、王景宇、贾波、周永业、董志刚、张鹏昊、张硕。

clause.p: 本文件规定了数字电影LED影厅的技术要求及相应的测量方法。
本文件适用于数字电影LED影厅的运行维护、检测认证、质量监督、技术管理和相关设备的安装、调试、验收和维护。

terms.title: 3术语和定义
terms.p: 下列术语和定义适用于本文件。
ISO和IEC用于标准化的术语数据库地址如下：

li.p: ISO在线浏览平台: 位于
IEC Electropedia: 位于

terms.p: 下列术语和定义适用于本文件。

preferred.strong: 数字电影影厅 ； LED digital LED cinema

definition.p: 采用数字电影技术，使用LED显示屏放映电影的影厅。

preferred.strong: 显示屏 ； LED LED display screen

definition.p: 以LED像素显示文字、图像及视频等信息的装置，通常包括LED屏体及显示控制系统等基本组成成分，也可包括辅助系统等，可采用一体式或分体式结构。
LED显示屏的最小成像单元。 注：通常由红色、绿色、蓝色发光二极管组成，每个发光二极管可视为亚像素。

preferred.strong: 电光转换函数 -； electro-optic transfer function

definition.p: 显示设备的输入编码值与光输出之间的函数关系。

preferred.strong: 立体放映消光比 ； stereoscopic extinction ratio

definition.p: 左眼（右眼）图像亮度对串扰光和环境光的抗扰能力。

termnote.name: 注1
termnote.p: 左眼（右眼）图像亮度与串扰光和环境光的比，用：1方式表示。

clause.title: 4缩略语
clause.p: 下列缩略语适用于本文件。
IMB 集成媒体模块（Integrated Media Block）
HDR 高动态范围（High Dynamic Range）
SDR 标准动态范围（Standard Dynamic Range）

clause.title: 5技术要求
clause.p: 数字电影LED影厅技术要求应符合表1的规定。

table.name: 表1 — 数字电影LED影厅技术要求

tr.td: a Filmmakers can prepare content that is optimized for any or each of the targets, and such content should always be clearly identified as to the intended playback luminance.

clause.title: 6.1.1亮度计
clause.p: The spectroradiometer shall comply with the requirements specified in GY/T 311—2017， 第4．5.

clause.title: 6.1.2Photometer
clause.p: Screen luminance shall be measured with a spot photometer having the spectral luminance response of the standard observer (photopic vision), as defined in SJ/T 11141—2017. The acceptance angle of the photometer shall be 2° or less. The lower limit of the measuring range shall be 0,01 cd/m2 or better. The photometer response to luminance variation over time shall be to properly integrate any such variation occurring at frequencies at or above 24 Hz and display the arithmetic mean value.

clause.title: 6.2.1White field signal
clause.p: The digital code values of the white field signal is (X‘=3 794, Y‘=3 960, Z‘=3 890).

clause.title: 6.3Measurement conditions and measurement requirements
clause.p: Measurement conditions shall meet the following requirements.

li.p: All equipment shall be in normal operating status.
Measurement shall be carried out after the light output of the digital projector stabilizes. Digital projector shall project white field signal through the stereoscopic equipment for 15 min.
The light of the digital projector shall pass through the stereoscopic projection equipment.
When measuring through the stereoscopic glasses they shall be placed in a horizontal state, as a viewer would wear them. No tilt from the horizontal axis is allowed.
All signals shall be output to the digital projector by Media Block. The measurement shall cover all valid screen images.
Measurement location in the auditorium shall comply with the requirements specified in SJ/T 11141—2017， 第4．3.
Measurement locations on the screen of Luminance, difference shall comply with the requirements specified in SJ/T 11141—2017， 第4．2.
For using dual stereoscopic cinema screenings, both of the digital projectors shall also be turned on and working normally.
The measurement of the optical system of stereoscopic projection should be carried out within the range of the white colour chromaticity coordinates of the centre of the screen.

clause.title: 6.4The measurement of the optical system of stereoscopic projection

li.p: Open the photometer and make it work normally.
Set the digital projector as the stereoscopic projection mode and use the stereoscopic projection equipment.
The white field signal is simultaneously displayed in the left and right eyes.

Using the photometer to measure and record the left-eye white field centre luminance,
L
l w
L_(lw), and the right-eye white field centre luminance,
L
r w
L_(rw), through the left-eye lens and the right-eye lens of the stereo glasses.

Calculate and record the centre luminance,
L
L, according to 公式（1）:

dd.p: is the centre luminance of the white field of the left-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the right-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

li.p:
Refer to the measurement method of centre luminance, record the left-eye white field centre luminance
L
l w
L_(lw) and the right-eye white field centre luminance
L
l w
L_(lw).

Calculate and record the luminance difference ratio
L d
L_(d) according to 公式（2）:

dd.p: is the centre luminance of the white field of the left-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the right-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

li.p: Open the photometer and make it work normally.
Set the digital projector as the stereoscopic projection mode and use the stereoscopic projection equipment.
The white field signal is simultaneously displayed in the left and right eyes.

Measure the luminance,
L
l w
L_(lw), of white field in the centre of screen and the luminance,
L
l s
L_(ls), of white field of four sides by using photometer through stereoscopic glasses of left-eye.

Measure the luminance,
L
r w
L_(rw), of white field in the centre of screen and the luminance,
L
l s
L_(ls), of white field of four sides by using photometer through stereoscopic glasses of right-eye.

Calculate and record the side luminance uniformity,
U l
U_(l) of the upper, lower, left and right edges of the white field of the left-eye according to 公式（3）:

dd.p: is the left-eye side luminance uniformity;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the left-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the left-eye luminance of white field of four sides when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

li.p:
calculate and record the side luminance uniformity
U r
U_(r) of the upper, lower, left and right sides of the white field of the right-eye according to 公式（4）:

dd.p: is the right-eye side luminance uniformity;
is the centre luminance of the white field of the right-eye when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal;
is the right-eye luminance of white field of four sides when the left and right eyes simultaneously display the white field signal.

li.p: Open the spectroradiometer and make it work normally.
Set the digital projector as the stereoscopic projection mode and use the stereoscopic projection equipment.
The white field signal is simultaneously displayed in the left and right eyes.
Using the spectroradiometer to measure and record the centre white chromaticity through the left-eye lens and the right-eye lens of the stereo glasses.
